mapper.select: SELECT COMMENTNO, GROUPNO, GROUPSEQ, TITLETAB, USERID, COMMENTCONTENT, REGDATE FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE FREEBOARDSEQ = #{freeboardseq} ORDER BY COMMENTNO, GROUPSEQ
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMMENTBOARD (COMMENTNO,GROUPNO, GROUPSEQ,TITLETAB,FREEBOARDSEQ,USERID,COMMENTCONTENT,REGDATE) VALUES( COMMENTNOSEQ.NEXTVAL, GROUPNOSEQ.NEXTVAL, 1, 0, #{freeboardseq}, #{userid}, #{commentcontent}, SYSDATE )

INSERT INTO COMMENTBOARD VALUES( COMMENTNOSEQ.NEXTVAL, (SELECT COMMENTNO FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMMENTNO = #{commentno}), (SELECT GROUPSEQ FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMMENTNO = #{commentno}) + 1, (SELECT TITLETAB +1 FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMMENTNO = #{commentno} ), #{freeboardseq}, #{userid}, #{commentcontent}, SYSDATE )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMMENTBOARD SET GROUPSEQ = GROUPSEQ +1 WHERE GROUPNO = (SELECT GROUPNO FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMMENTNO = #{commentno}) AND GROUPSEQ > (SELECT GROUPSEQ FROM COMMENTBOARD WHERE COMMENTNO = #{commentno})
